job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>The candidate must have SQL skills and must also have experience using Python or R. The analyst should be able to create strong, telling visualizations using a BI Tool, indicating possible areas of further investigation. Strong communication skills are a must, in order to help explain issues to the customer and provide possible solutions.&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Data Scientist Required or Preferred Skills&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Solid presentation skills.&nbsp;</li><li>Must have a Data Science Degree</li><li>Must have neural network knowledge/experience</li><li>Strong communication skills – able to give technical information in understandable terms.</li><li>Able to interact easily with clients.</li><li>SQL.&nbsp;</li><li>Python/R experience&nbsp;</li><li>Knows how to format and manipulate data.&nbsp;</li><li>Subject matter expertise in military maintenance data is preferred.&nbsp;</li><li>Experience in BI tools is preferred but not required.&nbsp;</li><li>Must be eager to learn and have an aptitude for thinking outside of the box.&nbsp;</li><li>Needs to be able to communicate ideas clearly and work in a collaborative environment.</li><li>Must have a propensity collecting and analyzing data, and presenting results in a concise manner with minimal guidance.</li></ul><p></p>
